WESTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
ALGERIA.
DNC 08.
VESSEL, 11 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
IN 36-48N 003-09E. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
